root.name: Arkadian Warriors
root.description: GameplayGameplay consists of trekking through randomly generated dungeons, completing the 19 quests and leveling up your character. Between quests, players can explore the town, healing themselves and buying and selling items at the store. Combat is for the most part button mashing. Each class has a different type of main attack, but those can change with the different items you find throughout the game. Each class also has its own set of spells that unlock as you level up, which deplete your mana. As you deal damage to the enemies, your Alter Ego meter fills up, which allows you to transform into a larger beast momentarily. Potions, which you can find or buy like other items, can refill not only your health meter, but your mana and Alter Ego meters as well. The game costs 800 Microsoft Points on the Xbox Live Marketplace. Overview Arkadian warriors is an action RPG that was developed by Wanako Studios for the Xbox 360 Arcade. The game was announced during the 2007 Leipzig Games Convention, and then was released later on December 12th, 2007. Reception Arkadian Warriors got a medicore reception from IGN getting a grade of 5.7/10. Many reviews gave it medicore reviews and have said it left players wanting to play something else.
